title: Inside the exclusive Bored Ape Yacht Club Party at BlockDown Festival
description:
The lavish Algarve coast in Portugal is set to be dazzled by a vibrant gathering of top-tier digital collectors at the Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) party on July 10th, 2023. Hosted at the BlockDown Festival in Albufeira, Portugal, the event promises extraordinary entertainment and networking. CryptoSlate sat down with DJ Ape to discuss what […]

The post Inside the exclusive Bored Ape Yacht Club Party at BlockDown Festival appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: ETH Moves Above $1,900, Hitting a 2-Month High to Start July
description: Ethereum entered the month of July in the green, as price traded at a two-month high to start the weekend. Markets moved to rebound on Saturday, after better than expected consumer sentiment data in the United Stated spooked traders. Bitcoin also rebounded, after falling below $30,000 on Friday. Bitcoin After falling below the $30,000 level […]

title: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032: Will ETH reach $8000 soon?
description: Ethereum Price Prediction 2023-2032 “The Merge did not change anything for holders/users.” Is that a fact? Crypto prices are unlikely to see a major recovery without new or returning investors bringing cash back into the market. Unless the retail people enter the market, Ethereum won’t strongly blast above ATH. Maybe something sparks retail, though, like Coinbase, ... Read more

title: Fidelity, VanEck and other moguls re-file bitcoin ETF applications
description: Several major investment firms have refiled their applications for spot bitcoin ETFs with the SEC, naming Coinbase as their exchange partner. Fidelity, WisdomTree, VanEck, and Invesco/Galaxy have all submitted applications. A spot bitcoin ETF would allow investors to get exposure…

title: Solana surpasses Ethereum in 24h NFT sales
description: In the past 24 hours, Solana’s NFT daily sales volume increased, surpassing Ethereum’s for the first time since May 2022. During a 24-hour period from June 30, the Solana (SOL) network produced more NFT sales in volume than Ethereum (ETH).…

title: JPMorgan Chase and 40 Other US Banks Conducting FedNow Trial Runs Ahead of the Instant Payment Service’s Launch
description:
Banking giant JPMorgan Chase and 40 other US banks are testing the Federal Reserve’s new instant payment infrastructure called FedNow. According to a new Federal Reserve press release, 41 banks and 15 service providers are wrapping up FedNow test trials ahead of an official launch of the service, which is scheduled for late July. Says […]

The post JPMorgan Chase and 40 Other US Banks Conducting FedNow Trial Runs Ahead of the Instant Payment Service’s Launch appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
